mapper.sql: UNIT_ID, UNIT_CODE, UNIT_NAME, EN_NAME, UNIT_TYPE, SPECIAL, ACCOUNT_CITY_ID, UNIT_CITY_CODE, PROVINCE_ID, CITY_ID, AREA_ID, ADDRESS, TELEPHONE, FAX, LNG, LAT, CUSTOMER_CORP_ID, DELIVER, DELIVER_DESCRIPTION, DELIVER_WASH, SWING_WASH, WASH_CAR, LEVEL, RECEIVE, DEALER_CODE, CITY_SETTLEMENT, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, CORP_ID, FLAG

unit.UNIT_ID,unit.UNIT_CODE,unit.UNIT_NAME,unit.EN_NAME,unit.UNIT_TYPE,unit.SPECIAL,unit.ACCOUNT_CITY_ID,city.CITY_NAME AS ACCOUNT_CITY_NAME, unit.UNIT_CITY_CODE,unit.PROVINCE_ID,cit.CITY_NAME AS PROVINCE_NAME,unit.CITY_ID,ci.CITY_NAME,unit.AREA_ID,ac.CITY_NAME AS AREA_NAME, unit.ADDRESS,unit.TELEPHONE,unit.FAX,unit.LNG,unit.LAT,unit.CREATOR,us.USER_NAME AS CREATE_NAME, unit.CREATE_TIME,unit.CORP_ID,c.CORP_NAME, unit.DELIVER, unit.DELIVER_DESCRIPTION, unit.DELIVER_WASH, SWING_WASH, unit.WASH_CAR, unit.LEVEL, unit.RECEIVE, unit.DEALER_CODE, corp.CORP_NAME as CUSTOMER_CORP_NAME,unit.CITY_SETTLEMENT,unit.FLAG

where unit.del = 0 and unit.UNIT_ID = #{unitId} and unit.UNIT_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{unitCode},'%') and unit.UNIT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{unitName},'%') and unit.EN_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{enName},'%') and unit.UNIT_TYPE = #{unitType} and unit.DELIVER = #{deliver} and unit.SPECIAL = #{special} and unit.ACCOUNT_CITY_ID = #{accountCityId} and city.CITY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{refAccountCity},'%') and unit.UNIT_CITY_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{unitCityCode},'%') and unit.PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId} and unit.CITY_ID = #{cityId} and unit.AREA_ID = #{areaId} and unit.ADDRESS LIKE CONCAT('%',#{address},'%') and unit.TELEPHONE = #{telephone} and unit.FAX = #{fax} and unit.LNG = #{lng} and unit.LAT = #{lat} and DELIVER_DESCRIPTION = #{deliverDescription} and DELIVER_WASH = #{deliverWash} and SWING_WASH = #{swingWash} and WASH_CAR = #{washCar} and LEVEL = #{level} and RECEIVE = #{receive} and DEALER_CODE = #{dealerCode} and CITY_SETTLEMENT = #{citySettlement} and unit.CREATOR = #{creator} and unit.CREATE_TIME = #{createTime} and unit.CORP_ID = #{corpId} and unit.FLAG = #{flag} and (unit.UNIT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%') or unit.DEALER_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%') ) and unit.CREATE_TIME >= #{startTime} and unit.CREATE_TIME <= #{endTime} and cit.CITY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{refProvinceName},'%') and ci.CITY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{refCityName},'%') and ac.CITY_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{refAreaName},'%') and unit.UNIT_ID in #{unitId}
where unit.del = 0 and unit.FLAG = 0 and (unit.UNIT_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%') or unit.DEALER_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchContent},'%') )
mapper.select: select FROM bd_unit unit LEFT JOIN bd_city city ON unit.ACCOUNT_CITY_ID = city.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN sys_corp corp ON corp.CORP_ID = unit.CUSTOMER_CORP_ID LEFT JOIN sys_corp c ON unit.CORP_ID = c.CORP_ID LEFT JOIN bd_city cit ON unit.PROVINCE_ID = cit.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN bd_city ci ON unit.CITY_ID = ci.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN bd_city ac ON unit.AREA_ID = ac.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN bd_user us ON unit.CREATOR = us.USER_ID where unit.UNIT_ID = #{unitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.update: update BD_UNIT set DEL=1 where UNIT_ID = #{unitId}
update BD_UNIT set DEL=1 where UNIT_ID in #{unitId}
mapper.insert: insert into bd_unit (UNIT_CODE, UNIT_NAME, EN_NAME, UNIT_TYPE, SPECIAL, ACCOUNT_CITY_ID, UNIT_CITY_CODE, PROVINCE_ID, CITY_ID, AREA_ID, ADDRESS, TELEPHONE, FAX, LNG, LAT, CUSTOMER_CORP_ID, DELIVER, DELIVER_DESCRIPTION, DELIVER_WASH, SWING_WASH, WASH_CAR, LEVEL, RECEIVE, DEALER_CODE, CITY_SETTLEMENT, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, CORP_ID, FLAG) values (#{unitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{special,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{accountCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{unitCityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lng,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{customerCorpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deliver,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deliverDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverWash,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{swingWash,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{washCar,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dealerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{citySettlement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into BD_UNIT UNIT_CODE, UNIT_NAME, EN_NAME, UNIT_TYPE, SPECIAL, ACCOUNT_CITY_ID, UNIT_CITY_CODE, PROVINCE_ID, CITY_ID, AREA_ID, ADDRESS, TELEPHONE, FAX, LNG, LAT, CUSTOMER_CORP_ID, DELIVER, DELIVER_DESCRIPTION, DELIVER_WASH, SWING_WASH, WASH_CAR, LEVEL, RECEIVE, DEALER_CODE, CITY_SETTLEMENT, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, CORP_ID, FLAG, #{unitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{special,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{accountCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{unitCityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lng,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{customerCorpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deliver,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deliverDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverWash,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{swingWash,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{washCar,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{receive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dealerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{citySettlement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update: update bd_unit UNIT_CODE = #{unitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT_NAME = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EN_NAME = #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT_TYPE = #{unitType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SPECIAL = #{special,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ACCOUNT_CITY_ID = #{accountCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UNIT_CITY_CODE = #{unitCityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LNG = #{lng,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, LAT = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CUSTOMER_CORP_ID = #{customerCorpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DELIVER = #{deliver,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DELIVER_DESCRIPTION = #{deliverDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELIVER_WASH = #{deliverWash,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SWING_WASH = #{swingWash,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WASH_CAR = #{washCar,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RECEIVE = #{receive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEALER_CODE = #{dealerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY_SETTLEMENT = #{citySettlement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, where UNIT_ID = #{unitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update bd_unit set UNIT_CODE = #{unitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT_NAME = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EN_NAME = #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UNIT_TYPE = #{unitType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SPECIAL = #{special,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ACCOUNT_CITY_ID = #{accountCityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UNIT_CITY_CODE = #{unitCityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, AREA_ID = #{areaId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TELEPHONE = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAX = #{fax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LNG = #{lng,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, LAT = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CUSTOMER_CORP_ID = #{customerCorpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, DELIVER = #{deliver,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DELIVER_DESCRIPTION = #{deliverDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DELIVER_WASH = #{deliverWash,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SWING_WASH = #{swingWash,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, WASH_CAR = #{washCar,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LEVEL = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, RECEIVE = #{receive,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DEALER_CODE = #{dealerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY_SETTLEMENT = #{citySettlement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CORP_ID = #{corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where UNIT_ID = #{unitId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select FROM bd_unit unit LEFT JOIN bd_city city ON unit.ACCOUNT_CITY_ID = city.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN sys_corp corp ON corp.CORP_ID = unit.CUSTOMER_CORP_ID LEFT JOIN sys_corp c ON unit.CORP_ID = c.CORP_ID LEFT JOIN bd_city cit ON unit.PROVINCE_ID = cit.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN bd_city ci ON unit.CITY_ID = ci.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN bd_city ac ON unit.AREA_ID = ac.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN bd_user us ON unit.CREATOR = us.USER_ID LEFT JOIN bd_unit_relation relation ON relation.ADS_CORP_ID = unit.CORP_ID AND unit.UNIT_ID = relation.UNIT_ID order by unit.CREATE_TIME DESC

select unit.UNIT_ID AS unitId,unit.UNIT_CODE AS unitCode,unit.UNIT_NAME AS unitName,unit.EN_NAME AS enName,unit.UNIT_TYPE AS unitType, unit.PROVINCE_ID AS provinceId,cit.CITY_NAME AS provinceName,unit.CITY_ID AS cityId,ci.CITY_NAME AS cityName, unit.AREA_ID AS areaId,ac.CITY_NAME AS areaName,unit.DEALER_CODE,unit.level, unit.ADDRESS AS address FROM bd_unit unit LEFT JOIN bd_city city ON unit.ACCOUNT_CITY_ID = city.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN sys_corp c ON unit.CORP_ID = c.CORP_ID LEFT JOIN bd_city cit ON unit.PROVINCE_ID = cit.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN bd_city ci ON unit.CITY_ID = ci.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN bd_city ac ON unit.AREA_ID = ac.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN bd_user us ON unit.CREATOR = us.USER_ID order by ${orderByClause}

select FROM bd_unit unit LEFT JOIN bd_city city ON unit.ACCOUNT_CITY_ID=city.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN sys_corp corp ON corp.CORP_ID = unit.CUSTOMER_CORP_ID LEFT JOIN sys_corp c ON unit.CORP_ID=c.CORP_ID LEFT JOIN bd_city cit ON unit.PROVINCE_ID=cit.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN bd_city ci ON unit.CITY_ID=ci.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN bd_city ac ON unit.AREA_ID=ac.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN bd_user us ON unit.CREATOR=us.USER_ID where unit.DEL=0 and unit.LNG = #{lng,jdbcType=DOUBLE} and unit.LAT = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}

select t1.*, t2.USER_ID, t3.USER_NAME, t3.PHONE from bd_unit as t1 left join bd_contacts as t2 on t1.UNIT_ID = t2.UNIT_ID left join bd_user as t3 on t2.USER_ID = t3.USER_ID where t1.UNIT_ID = #{unitId}

select FROM bd_unit unit LEFT JOIN bd_city city ON unit.ACCOUNT_CITY_ID=city.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN sys_corp corp ON corp.CORP_ID = unit.CUSTOMER_CORP_ID LEFT JOIN sys_corp c ON unit.CORP_ID=c.CORP_ID LEFT JOIN bd_city cit ON unit.PROVINCE_ID=cit.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN bd_city ci ON unit.CITY_ID=ci.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN bd_city ac ON unit.AREA_ID=ac.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN bd_user us ON unit.CREATOR=us.USER_ID where unit.DEL=0 AND unit.UNIT_NAME = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select FROM bd_unit unit LEFT JOIN bd_city city ON unit.ACCOUNT_CITY_ID=city.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN sys_corp corp ON corp.CORP_ID = unit.CUSTOMER_CORP_ID JOIN sys_corp c ON unit.CORP_ID=c.CORP_ID JOIN bd_city cit ON unit.PROVINCE_ID=cit.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN bd_city ci ON unit.CITY_ID=ci.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN bd_city ac ON unit.AREA_ID=ac.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN bd_user us ON unit.CREATOR=us.USER_ID where unit.DEL=0 AND unit.UNIT_NAME=#{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select FROM bd_unit where DEL=0 and flag = 0 AND UNIT_NAME in #{name}

select FROM bd_unit unit LEFT JOIN bd_city city ON unit.ACCOUNT_CITY_ID=city.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN sys_corp corp ON corp.CORP_ID = unit.CUSTOMER_CORP_ID LEFT JOIN sys_corp c ON unit.CORP_ID=c.CORP_ID LEFT JOIN bd_city cit ON unit.PROVINCE_ID=cit.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN bd_city ci ON unit.CITY_ID=ci.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN bd_city ac ON unit.AREA_ID=ac.CITY_ID LEFT JOIN bd_user us ON unit.CREATOR=us.USER_ID where unit.UNIT_NAME = #{unitName} and unit.FLAG = 0 and unit.DEL = 0
select UNIT_ID from bd_unit where UNIT_NAME = #{unitName} and FLAG = 0 and DEL = 0
select FROM bd_unit where DEL=0 and flag = 0 AND UNIT_ID in #{unitId}
